common.ShippingMessage_FreeWeekdayDelivery: Free weekday Delivery on orders over £50
common.ShippingMessage_DeliverySchedule: On average orders are taking a minimum of 3–4 working days delivery. Delays are expected across the bank holiday, please see our <helpDeliveryLink>delivery schedule</helpDeliveryLink>
common.ShippingMessage_StockReserved: Stock is reserved once you have completed payment at checkout.
common.ShippingMessage_SMSCollection: You will be notified by SMS when your collection items are ready, they will then be held in store for 21 days.
common.ShippingMessage_DispatchedForNextDay: Product dispatched from our distribution centre for collection <helpCollectionLink>Next Day*</helpCollectionLink>.
common.ShippingMessage_OrderAfterPayment: Your order will be processed once payment is received at the checkout.
common.ShippingMessage_WillSendSMS: We will send you an SMS once your order is ready. Please do not travel to store until you have received your SMS. Your order is held in store for 21 days.
common.ShippingMessage_DeliveryInstructions: You'll receive notification from our approved supplier with delivery instructions as soon as they're available.
common.ShippingMessage_DeliveryWithRestrictions: This item will be delivered directly to you by our supplier and there are carrier restrictions in place for some locations. Please see the <helpDeliveryRestrictionsLink>delivery restrictions table</helpDeliveryRestrictionsLink> to check your area/postcode.
common.ShippingMessage_DeliveryDetails: We will pass your details (including phone number) to our supplier who will arrange delivery with you. Delivery will take place Monday to Friday between 8am – 6pm.
common.ShippingMessage_ReturnPolicyReturnable: More information can be found on the product page.
common.ShippingMessage_ReturnPolicyReturnableVi: Please note - If you wish to return this item you will need to call us on our freephone number 03330 112 112 to arrange a free collection.
common.ShippingMessage_ReturnPolicyNonReturnabl: More information can be found on the product page.

common.VideoDisabled_Text: You need to update your cookie setting to view video content. To do this simply set the YouTube cookie to be 'on'. You can make this change here.
common.ComparePage_ProductRemovedWarning: You can compare up to three items on your chosen device or browser window size. The last item in your compare list has been removed. To compare this item again, please remove another item first or resize your browser window and then re-add the item.

common.Header_BrowserSupportTitle: Please check your browser, you may need to update it.
common.Header_BrowserSupportDescription: Due to forthcoming changes to improve security, older browsers* will no longer be able to handle payment online. These updates are part of an industry-wide initiative to improve standards

common.ProductCard_ButtonClickAndCollectTitle: Add this item to your basket for Collection
common.ProductCard_ButtonDeliverTitle: Add this item to your basket for Delivery
common.Compare_MaxCompareListSizeReached: You can compare up to four items. Please remove an item from your compare list.
common.ProductStepper_LoadingMessage: Please wait whilst we update your selection
common.StockAvailability_CollectService_Text:
We offer a delivery service direct to store, site or home.

Order by 9pm Weekdays, 6pm Saturdays and 5pm Sundays for next day delivery. Any orders placed after these cut off times will be delivered the following working day.

If you are collecting from a store, please await your "ready to collect" SMS before travelling. Home and site deliveries are between 8.30am and 6.30pm Monday - Saturday.

Geographical restrictions apply - For Northern Ireland, the Scottish Isles, The Isle Of Man and certain mainland post codes the delivery service is between 48-72 hours. Please visit delivery restrictions for affected postcodes.
common.WelcomeOverlay_ROI_Text: Over 10,000 products available to Click & Collect in as little as 1 minute & 27,000 products available for home delivery.
common.WelcomeOverlay_FR_Text: Plus de 10 000 produits livrables à domicile en France métropolitaine et en Corse.
common.WelcomeOverlay_UK_Title: For delivery to the UK (inc NI)
common.WelcomeOverlay_UK_Text: Over 10,000 products available to Click & Collect in as little as 1 minute & 57,000 products available for home delivery.
common.WelcomeOverlay_EU_Text: Over 4,000 products available for delivery between 48hrs and 72hrs to Spain, Poland, Belgium, Netherlands, Austria and Sweden.
common.Link_Email_A11yText: Send an email to {{email}}. Opens in your default email application in a new window.
